item.title: Magof P√•sgua Nochebuena 2020
item.description: H√•fa adai todus hamyu yan Magof P√•sgua Nochebuena para siha ni' ma√±ilebra. Christmas time for me today has shifted mostly towards i bandan asagu√•-hu. Gi minag√•het, hagas ha' hu silebra Nochebuena yan i famili√•-√±a. On my side of the family we tend to split time between my dad’s side and my mom’s side. Even then, those parties tend to be closer to New Years or after, i.e., my family tends to celebrate Christmas after New Years — ya maolek-√±a i “sales” dispues di New Years ki antes, hunggan?

item.title: Kasiyas 2020
item.description: Hu tugi' ini na poem para Kasiyas 2020; put hu sohyu' todus hamyu para konsigi fumino' Chamoru. Yanggen malago' hao umegga', si√±a hao gi Facebook –> click here (manaitai yu' gi ~45 minutes üëçüèº) — translation below poem Fino' Chamoru Mungnga ma‚Äô√•‚Äô√±ao fumino‚Äô Chamoru, Achokka‚Äô ennao muna‚Äôma‚Äô√•‚Äô√±ao hao. Achokka‚Äô hinasso-mu na mapput para h√•gu, Maolek√±a kumekefino' ki pum√•para Si√±a un tutuhun p√•‚Äôgu na ha‚Äô√•ni, Lao maolek ha‚Äô yanggen ti si√±a hao.

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu Pt. 2
item.description: I finene’na na blog guini. Buenas yan h√•fa adai todus hamyu! √Öpmam na tiempu na m√•nggi' yu' guini, hunggan? Gi minag√•het, gof tinani' yu' desde ki t√•tti hugua na pulan. Kada diha hu ripiti ta’lu na bid√•-hu: makm√•ta yu' yan etsisiu pat chochu, pues macho’chu', ya pues hug√•ndu yan i lahi-hu. Todu eyu ha tifi' yu', lol. I asunto put ini na blog kosa ki hu m√•s p√•tti hamyu ni taiminapput sin√•ngan siha na hu sang√•ni i lahi-hu.

item.title: Mampus Chaddek i Lahi-hu
item.description: Kada diha, hu li’i' mal√•lagu i lahi-hu gi uriyan guma'-m√•mi. Gaigi gui' gi me’nan potta, pues ha mal√•gu h√•lum i kuatton-m√•mi, pues gaigi gui' gi tatti yu' pat fi’on-hu. Ai adai, guaha na bi√•hi ti si√±a hu sodda' i tiempu para dumesk√•nsa. Lao gi minag√•het, eyu ha na’magof yu' sa' hu lili’i' gui' dum√•ngkulu; m√•s chumach√•lek gui', gof ya-√±a humug√•gandu yan hami yan si Lorie asagu√•-hu, ya bula kumukuentus gui'!

item.title: Adingani i Lahi-hu
item.description: Note: updated 2020-12-22 by removing reference to my since-deleted write.as blog. Most of the Chamoru that I’ve been using lately is towards i lahi-hu. H√•cha na s√•kkan id√•t-√±a, pues inadingan-m√•mi ni ti mapput. I wanted to share some of those phrases with you and perhaps get some feedback. If you’re here then I’ll assume you came from Twitter, IG, or some other social media site. Feel free to hit me up on any of those.

item.title: I Tinituhon
item.description: Note: Updated 2020-12-22 with added English title. Buenas yan h√•fa adai todus hamyu! Guahu i che’lun-miyu as David Taitingfong ya ini iyo-ku na blog ni' un taitaitai. I’ve been meaning to get this space started for some time but, if I’m being honest, so many things have gotten in my way - and by many things I mean myself and the plethora of projects that I can’t seem to stop accruing.
